reviews.review:
Absolute garbage. I find it unreal that after 5 years of fixing the game so many bugs are fixed and so many remain, almost as if the game was made to fail. 
UPDATES: I can not comprehend how it is possible for a game to exist for 5 years and then when they release an update, i have to re-download the update 3 times (no joke, actual 3 times) just to delete the game and download it again because it keeps FUCKING VERIFYING. What in the hell are you verifying for 20 minutes? Your stupid spyware you implanted on my pc to look at my dick pics? 
PLAYERS: The community is straight up toxic. You know those toxic stupid russian and poland players that travel in packs in cs-go as a 4 man premade and kick you on the last round? Well, those same players happen to play this game, for real, every time you see a stupid russian yell –ò–¥–∏ –Ω–∞ —Ö—É–π in cs go, please check his profile and you will find that he also happens to have 200+ hours in DBD. Where he most likely face-camps or tunnels players to cope with having double digit IQ and donkey teeth. 
It is nearly impossible to go up against non toxic survivors or non toxic killers, to add icing on the cake the survivors are toxic to each other as well so if you ever come up with or against these players, and you will, know that the only cure for it is drinking rat poison.
COUNTERPLAY: There is barely any fucking counterplay, well other than "just deal with it m8". The fact that there are top tier killers while killers already are strong as hell is just beyond cringe (No other way to "balance" an asymmetrical game other than to give one side an advantage). If a killer that is decent decides to put iridescent addons on his already broken ability just dc, why let someone ruin your free time playing just because he felt like it. "-rep dc survivor" written by a killer that got bullied by his classmates that day and wanted to vent on survivors, so he brought iridescent addons and Ebony Memento Mori, you are lucky if you black pip against shit like this. Last year I had to deal with a stupid russian coming by every day for 6 months to comment on my profile calling me bad when he got a VAC ban on his account for cheating, he barely walks and chews gum at the same time yet has the audacity to think he can be good at something.
Killers have to deal every few games with a SWF, and if the group of survivors is competent, you are either going to sweat bullets that game to win, or you will straight up feel molested, there is no in between. It is unreasonable that both sides can manage to be unfairly strong and its a good sign of a game being dog water. 
DEVS: They are pretty much shitsniffers. Let me give you a reminder. 
The year is 2019 November 30, you open twitter to see a tweet from DBD, what is it? Bug fixes? Game improvement? Money back for this shit game? No. Let me quote it: Spread some love by voting for Dead by Daylight in the category "The Labor of Love" for the Steam Awards. #DeadbyDaylight #DBD #VoteDBD 
Here is the Tweet link https://twitter.com/DeadByBHVR/status/1200555042522226691
Can you imagine what kind of shitstain developer you have to be to ask people to vote for labor of love when the only reason you are working on the game for more than 3+ years is because you are not competent enough to make any other successful game, so you spend by now what is 5 years milking it? They know the success of this game was just pure luck, so they keep milking it dry and now they want awards for being incompetent, big KEKW there my boy. 
QUALITY BAIT M8: Their old player base is dying faster than a lung cancer patient infected with corona and they know this. So what is their solution? Bring in tons of new players by adding DLCs such as Silent Hill and Resident evil, so people come to play as the characters from those DLCs and after staying for a few hundred hours, they realize this game is hot garbage and leave, bam, new DLC and the cycle is repeated.
Spare yourself the trouble, it is better to go to the gym for 200 hours (one hour each day) and get shredded, than to play this and get crippling depression and autism that stack with any other mental illness you can get from this game.
Stay safe bois, wish you all the best.
It's fun to farm BP or to take the game seriously, Killer and Survivor are both interesting in their own ways

Trust me dont buy it, it might destroy your life of a friends life.

This game is just decreasing in quality constantly. They introduce toxic survivor-sided benefits so they nerf them and introduce toxic killer-sided benefits but the game spent so much time being a cesspool of disgusting toxicity that no one stops playing like the cesspool of toxic players they are, because why would you? You've been shit on constantly on both sides, whether it's SWF fucking with you for 15 mins or killers that only camp and tunnel. The game actually used to be fun and I could play for hours on end, but now I have to take month-long breaks, attempt to play for the new tome (that's quite bland this time), and still have no fun. It's pointless because BHVR doesn't seem to care their game is trash now.
